subject: Animal Abuse, Rights and Welfare
Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
organizations: People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals
lead_paragraph: An undercover investigator for the animal rights group gathered evidence of mistreatment of racehorses while working for the trainer Steve Asmussen and his assistant Scott Blasi.
snippet: An undercover investigator for the animal rights group gathered evidence of mistreatment of racehorses while working for the trainer Steve Asmussen and his assistant Scott Blasi.
